header_description:
Most dating apps focus on fast and easy access to millions of people, which makes the experience unfocused as people feel rewarded by collecting quantity over quality of matches. They donâ€™t invest in getting to know a person better, and Fika wants to change that.
Fika focuses on connecting people, and we are proud to share their stories.

seo.title: Successful connection stories from Fika's online community
seo.description: Lovestories and meaningful connections will show you that life is beautiful as always
